Name: Blink Planets
About the game: Have you ever dreamed of becoming a pioneer of the universe and developing a whole new planet? Blink Planets is a strategy puzzle game based on the idea of ​​adding planet terraforming to a hexagonal board game. The main task of the game is to efficiently place blocks representing different resources, so that people can successfully settle on strange planets in space. The colorful Base symbolizes the resources needed to develop a planet. Water, energy, greenery, weather, and gold mines... they don't seem to have anything to do with each other, but the Bases and Blocks are all intertwined to form a habitable planet. Every time, the planets change into a new appearance. Create your own planet by connecting each resource effectively within a limited time. What will your planet look like? Key Features Explore the unknown planets in the mysterious universe, and enjoy the charm of terrains. There is no right answer in making a planet. Use the random Base resources to explore new planets with each time. At the crossroads of choice, pick a module according to your feelings and have fun of growing in an unexpected direction. If you need a moment to think, just press the pause button and consider. Your planet will be more beautiful. Unlock new terrain and achievements as you master the game. Send your own planet into GIF and share it with your friends.
